abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders defeat Ottawa Senators, 3-1.

headline.print_headline: Islanders End Four-Game Slide to Protect Wild-Card Spot
headline.main: Islanders End Four-Game Slide to Protect Wild-Card Spot

snippet: The Islanders’ victory at Barclays Center brought their longest losing streak of the season to a close.
lead_paragraph: The Islanders’ victory at Barclays Center brought their longest losing streak of the season to a close.
